titleStmt.title: An explanation of the proposal lately given in to the Honourable House of Commons, signed William James. It is humbly proposed that guineas, and all other gold coins now currant, be brought into the Exchequer ...
titleStmt.author: James, William, fl. 1689-1695.

titleStmt.title: An explanation of the proposal lately given in to the Honourable House of Commons, signed William James. It is humbly proposed that guineas, and all other gold coins now currant, be brought into the Exchequer ...
titleStmt.author: James, William, fl. 1689-1695.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William James himself by Wing.
Title includes opening words of text.
Date and place of publication from Wing.
Endorsed on verso: Coin and Supply.
Reproduction of the original in the Goldsmith's Company Library, University of London.
